title: Fix type errors in Drizzle migration
description:
Fix the type errors from the Drizzle migration. The typecheck is failing with these errors.

## Progress
✅ Fixed message importance nullability (3 locations in projections-drizzle.ts)
✅ Fixed boolean storage (3 locations in store-drizzle.ts)  
✅ Fixed dynamic query builders (store-drizzle.ts and projections-drizzle.ts)
✅ Updated Drizzle schema to use snake_case property names

## Blocked On
Cannot access files reserved by other agents (SilverDusk, SwiftMoon) to complete the migration:
- packages/swarm-mail/src/hive/projections.ts
- packages/swarm-mail/src/hive/queries.ts
- packages/swarm-mail/src/streams/index.ts

## Remaining Work
All remaining fixes are mechanical find-replace operations documented in /tmp/remaining-fixes.md.
Estimated 10 minutes once file access is granted.
